answers.answer: I had 3 ultrasound 12, 19 and 32 weeks. How many weeks are you?

Yeah it is normal unfortunately with many places..some do more than others,as long as your pregnancy is progressing normally with no problems they dont see the need to for more scans,i have a seen a good few topics like this come up so youre certainly not alone

I've had two one to say yep there's a baby there and another that told me the gender and at that same ultrasound they made sure she was developing properly so yeah perfectly normal. And I'm 37+5 and I'll not have anymore done.

that's pretty normal, like others have mentioned  unless there is a concern there isn't  a need for more. complications in pregnancy is when they typically do more scans. ive had four all together because of my gestational diabetes to monitor babies weight. so really  its a good thing your not having more. there are even some studies out there that say its not really the best for developing baby anyway so its not a bad idea to avoid excessive intervention.
I had a dating scan - 6 weeksA nuchal scan - 12 weeksThen an anomaly scan at 19 weeks (gender) ...I also am getting 4D done at 30 weeksAnd then finally 32 week growth scan

question: My Doctor said that I don't get another unltrasound but I've only had a dating ultra sound and the one to determine the gender. Is that normal? Do I need to have another one? I feel like everyone else has had so much more during their pregnancy.
title: just wondering
